articles.title: „Orion“-Kapsel wieder erfolgreich auf der Erde gelandet
articles.image_title: December 9, 2022 - Moon Atmosphere: On flight day 20 of the Artemis I mission, December 5th, Orion captured the Moon on the day of return powered flyby, the final major engine maneuver of the flight test. The burn, which used the spacecraft's main engine on the European-built service module, lasted 3 minutes, 27 seconds, and changed the velocity of the spacecraft by about 655 mph (961 feet per second). It also committed the spacecraft to a December 11 splashdown, which will air live on NASA Television. (Credit Image: © NASA/ZUMA Press Wire Service
articles.author: 46 Sek
